org.openimaj.image.feature.local.detector.dog.extractor

Class OrientationHistogramExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.feature.local.detector.dog.extractor.OrientationHistogramExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorExtractor<FloatFV,GradientScaleSpaceImageExtractorProperties<FImage>>

    public class OrientationHistogramExtractor
extends Object
implements FeatureVectorExtractor<FloatFV,GradientScaleSpaceImageExtractorProperties<FImage>>
    Extract an orientation histogram about an interest point. The window size is proportional to the scale of the interest point, and the samples are weighted by a Gaussian centered on the interest point with a variance proportional to the interest point scale. The histogram is also smoothed using the approach in the vlfeat implementation; multiple smoothings using a [1/3,1/3,1/3] kernel in a circular manner (i.e. it is assumed the histogram wraps around).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_NUM_BINS
      Default number of orientation histogram bins; Lowe's IJCV paper (p.13) suggests 36 bins.
      static float DEFAULT_SAMPLING_SIZE
      Default value for the size of the sampling window relative to the sampling scale.
      static float DEFAULT_SCALING
      Default value for weighting the scaling Gaussian relative to the keypoint scale.
      static int DEFAULT_SMOOTHING_ITERATIONS
      Default value for the number of iterations of the smoothing filter.
      protected int numBins 
      protected float samplingSize 
      protected float scaling 
      protected int smoothingIterations

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_NUM_BINS

        public static int DEFAULT_NUM_BINS
        Default number of orientation histogram bins; Lowe's IJCV paper (p.13) suggests 36 bins.

      • DEFAULT_SCALING

        public static float DEFAULT_SCALING
        Default value for weighting the scaling Gaussian relative to the keypoint scale. Lowe's IJCV paper (p.13) suggests 1.5.

      • DEFAULT_SMOOTHING_ITERATIONS

        public static int DEFAULT_SMOOTHING_ITERATIONS
        Default value for the number of iterations of the smoothing filter. The vlfeat SIFT implementation uses 6.

      • DEFAULT_SAMPLING_SIZE

        public static float DEFAULT_SAMPLING_SIZE
        Default value for the size of the sampling window relative to the sampling scale. Lowe's ICCV paper suggests 3;

      • numBins

        protected int numBins

      • scaling

        protected float scaling

      • smoothingIterations

        protected int smoothingIterations

      • samplingSize

        protected float samplingSize

        Construct with the given parameter values.
        Parameters:
        numBins - number of orientation histogram bins

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeature

        public FloatFV[] extractFeature(GradientScaleSpaceImageExtractorProperties<FImage> props)
        Extract the orientation histogram given the properties. This method caches gradient and orientation maps as it's likely to be called multiple times (at different positions) for the same input image.
        Specified by:
        extractFeature in interface FeatureVectorExtractor<FloatFV,GradientScaleSpaceImageExtractorProperties<FImage>>
        Parameters:
        props - Properties describing the interest point in scale space.
        Returns:
        a FloatFV object representing the orientation histogram.

      • extractFeatureRaw

        public float[] extractFeatureRaw(GradientScaleSpaceImageExtractorProperties<FImage> properties)
        Extract the orientation histogram given the properties. This method caches gradient and orientation maps as it's likely to be called multiple times (at different positions) for the same input image.
        Parameters:
        properties - Properties describing the interest point in scale space.
        Returns:
        a float array representing the orientation histogram.
